SELECT wcm.user_name, wu.user_id, wu.head_image_url, IF(wcm.`status`!='1','3','2') sendStatus, wcm.remark, GROUP_CONCAT( IF ( wcm.external_name = '', wg.group_name, wcm.external_name ) SEPARATOR '„ÄÅ' ) customers, count(IF(wcm.external_name = '', wg.group_name, wcm.external_name)) `count` FROM we_customer_messgaeResult wcm LEFT JOIN we_group wg ON wg.chat_id = wcm.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_customer_message m ON m.message_id = wcm.message_id LEFT JOIN we_customer_messageoriginal wcmo ON wcmo.message_original_Id = m.original_id LEFT JOIN we_user wu on (wcm.userid = wu.user_id or wg.owner = wu.user_id) AND wu.corp_id = wcmo.corp_id
wcm.message_id=#{messageId} AND wcmo.corp_id = #{corpId} AND wcm.`status`='0'
AND wcm.user_name LIKE concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
GROUP BY wcm.user_name

SELECT wcm.user_name, wc.avatar head_image_url, IF ( wcm.`status` != '1', '3', '2' ) sendStatus, wcm.remark, IF ( wcm.external_name = '', wg.group_name, wcm.external_name ) customers, IF(wcm.external_userid = '',wcm.chat_id,wcm.external_userid) receiverId FROM we_customer_messgaeResult wcm LEFT JOIN we_group wg ON wg.chat_id = wcm.chat_id LEFT JOIN we_customer_message m ON m.message_id = wcm.message_id LEFT JOIN we_customer_messageoriginal wcmo ON wcmo.message_original_Id = m.original_id LEFT JOIN we_customer wc ON wcm.external_userid = wc.external_userid AND wc.corp_id = wcmo.corp_id
wcm.message_id=#{messageId} AND wcmo.corp_id = #{corpId}
AND wcm.`status`!= '0'
AND wcm.`status`= '1'
AND wcm.`status` NOT IN ('0','1')
AND wcm.user_name LIKE concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
AND wcm.external_name LIKE concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
AND wg.group_name LIKE concat('%', #{groupName}, '%')
GROUP BY customers,receiverId
